Magic Notes:
Deadly Touch: Touch kills target w/up to 20d6 HP 1/dy
Empower Spell: x1.5 chosen spell variable effects uses +2 spell slot
Enlarge Spell: x2 chosen spell range uses +1 spell slot
Eschew Materials: Cast spells w/out materials
Forge Ring: Create and mend magic rings
Spontaneous Legate Spell: Cast Inflict in place of known spell
Temple Dependency: Must participate at temple to receive spells
Widen Spell: x2 area of affect uses +3 spell slot
